name: 2DPocalypse
description:
(Game made Using Flow lab)

 Escape the Mysterious 2D World which you're trapped in to get your self Saved! Go through many levels, whether easy or no, Escape it or If you do, It's Game over!

Credits:

Developer: Jasneet Singh

------------Information-------------

2Dpocalypse is a 2D-Adventure to be released on March 20, 2022 on USA. 

The Supported Platforms are Windows, IOS, Android, Mac Os and Linux.

Trial Game: https://flowlab.io/game/play/1947578

Only HTML Link and Download Available. (v1.0.0)
